entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
